channel.title: Send selection as possesor
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was possessor I jumped to 8 and was asked to claim in my new body so I hit send selection it posted my original logs
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I believe it is supposed to go from my new bodies log bog not mine
#### Steps to reproduce: I don't know if I can for a while now since it is #### Comments: game around 1:40 us central time. I managed to win because only the alch noticed the goof.
